# My First Mod - Still Learning and Evolving!
- Currently contains **basic** markings. - More content will be added in future updates!
# Easily Detail Your Airport Ground!
This mod adds new decals and netlane markings to the game, making it much easier to decorate your airport surfaces.
## With this mod, you can:
- Add intricate details to your airport taxiways, runways, and aprons. - Make your airport look highly realistic and professional.
## Currently Included:
- **Complete sets** of basic taxiway markings: Letters (A-Z), "OUTBOUND" text, standard holding points. - Basic taxiway centerline markings (standard and enhanced styles, including an **ILS Critical Area Boundary** marking). - Runway markings: Full sets of runway numbers (**0-9**) and suffix letters (**L, R, C**) in different sizes (**Small, Medium, Large**) - Straight lines in various colors (e.g., white, yellow) and widths (thin, medium, thick) - perfect for creating touchdown zones or other custom markings. - **Complete sets** of white letter and number decals (A-Z, 0-9) for adding detailed labels and information.
## Important Notes:
- This mod focuses on ground detailing, providing **decals and painted line markings only** (no 3D objects or functional changes). - To accommodate airports of all sizes and diverse player creativity, the included elements are **basic building blocks**. They are not pre-configured "standard parts" but rather versatile markings and textures, giving you maximum freedom for DIY customization!
## Future Plans:
- Add additional letter sets in **yellow** and **black** color schemes for greater visual variety. - Add more essential markings: Runway shoulders, taxiway shoulders, more kinds of direction arrows, etc.
## Ultimate Goal:
- Provide all the decals, line markings, and surface textures needed to create a **FAA-compliant** (or ICAO-standard) airport!
